infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: We need access to your microphone for recording audio as you explain your problem-solving approach.
infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: We need access to speech recognition to convert your spoken problem-solving approach to text and let AI check whether it is correct.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Our app uses libraries that might reference the photo library to render images describing coding problems, but we do not access your photos.
infoPlist.NSUserNotificationsUsageDescription: Our app uses libraries that might reference push notifications, but we do not send or receive notifications.
